# Methods

1. Get reference genome

```{R, code=readLines("getGenome.sh"), echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
```

2. Get NGS reads from SRA SRR6808334

```{R, code=readLines("getReads.sh"), echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
```

3. Trim the reads using Trimmomatic 

```{R, code=readLines("trimReads.sh"), echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
```

4. Index the trimmed geneome 

```{R, code=readLines("indexGenome.sh"), echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
```

5. Align the reads using BWA-MEM

```{R, code=readLines("alignReads.sh"), echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
```

6. Run the DeepVariant to get VCF file 

```{R, code=readLines("analyzeVariants.sh"), echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
```
